title: Flexbox
description: Master the flexible box layout model for modern responsive designs

lessons.title: Container
lessons.description: Learn how to create a flex container and understand the main and cross axes.
lessons.task: Add <kbd>display: flex</kbd> to <kbd>.flex-container</kbd> to create a flexbox layout.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: system-ui, sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .box { background: steelblue; color: white; padding: 1rem; margin: 8px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; }

lessons.title: Direction & Wrap
lessons.description: Control the direction and wrapping of flex items within a container.

lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: system-ui, sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .box { background: steelblue; color: white; padding: 1rem; margin: 8px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; width: 3rem; height: 3rem; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }
lessons.sandboxCSS: .flex-container { border: 2px dashed #aaa; padding: 1rem; height: 16rem; display: flex; }

lessons.title: Justify Content
lessons.description: Learn how to align flex items along the main axis of the flex container.
lessons.task: Add <kbd>justify-content: space-between</kbd> to <kbd>.flex-container</kbd> to distribute the boxes evenly.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: system-ui, sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .box { background: steelblue; color: white; padding: 1rem; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; width: 3rem; height: 3rem; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }

lessons.title: Align Items
lessons.description: Control how flex items are aligned along the cross axis of the flex container.
lessons.task: Add <kbd>align-items: center</kbd> to <kbd>.flex-container</kbd> to vertically center the boxes.

lessons.sandboxCSS: .flex-container { border: 2px dashed #aaa; padding: 1rem; display: flex; height: 10rem; }

lessons.title: Flex Grow
lessons.description: The <kbd>flex</kbd> property controls how much an item grows relative to others.
lessons.task: Add <kbd>flex: 2</kbd> to <kbd>.box2</kbd> to make it grow twice as wide.

lessons.title: Align Self
lessons.description: Use <kbd>align-self</kbd> to override alignment for a single flex item.
lessons.task: Add <kbd>align-self: flex-start</kbd> to <kbd>.middle</kbd> to move it to the top.
